citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
APHIS officials noticed two mini zebu cattle and one goat with elongated hooves. The goat had both front hooves
elongated with a curve to the left. The two mini zebus had elongated hooves on all four limbs. Elongated and curved
hooves can cause discomfort, pain, and changes in the animal strides that can lead to further medical issues. Each dealer
or exhibitor shall establish and maintain programs of adequate veterinary care that include the availability of appropriate
facilities, personnel, equipment, and services to comply with the provisions of this subchapter.
To be corrected by August 5, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
Additional Inspectors:
KRISTIN NAPOLI, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALIST n

narrative:
2.40(b)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
APHIS officials noticed two mini zebu cattle and one goat with elongated hooves. The goat had both front hooves 
elongated with a curve to the left. The two mini zebus had elongated hooves on all four limbs. Elongated and curved 
hooves can cause discomfort, pain, and changes in the animal strides that can lead to further medical issues. Each dealer 
or exhibitor shall establish and maintain programs of adequate veterinary care that include the availability of appropriate 
facilities, personnel, equipment, and services to comply with the provisions of this subchapter. 
 
To be corrected by August 5, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KRISTIN NAPOLI, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALIST n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
